title: In praise of Covid Data
description: On this week’s programme we talk to Clare Griffiths from the UK’s coronavirus dashboard and Alexis Madrigal from the Atlantic Magazine’s Covid Tracking Project in the US.
itunes:subtitle: How we came to expect dashboards full of statistics.
itunes:summary: On this week’s programme we talk to Clare Griffiths from the UK’s coronavirus dashboard and Alexis Madrigal from the Atlantic Magazine’s Covid Tracking Project in the US.
itunes:author: BBC Radio 4
